name: Fixie Town! 14 Childrens Games
description:
A lot of incidents happened in Fixies Town! The town needs its heroes!
Restore order and save the town with little funny creatures The Fixies. Nolik, SImka, Fire, Verda, Toola, Digit, Papus, Masiya and Grandpus are waiting for all kids!

Complete missions:
"Catching Spiders"
Fill the jar with spiders! Catch them until they hide!
"Hide and seek"
The Fixies got lost in the dark room. Find them all!
"Catch the dog"
The dog is in the kitchen! Catch it until it eats all food!
"Entraining"
Put goods into the train and send it to town. Drag items to correct places on the train.
"Right places"
What a mess in the room! Find right places for all things!
"Electricity leakage"
Seems there is an electricity leakage! Catch sparks to repair it!
"The railway"
The railway is broken! Fix the rails to let the train pass!
"Clean up"
What a mess in the room! Everything is broken! Use tools to clean it up!
"Vitamins"
Catch vitamins and feed The Fixies!
"Chocolate"
Find right places for chocolates in a box!
"Electricity"
Complete the maze and light all bulbs!
"Submarine"
Fix the tube for the Submarine to deliver goods to town!
"Bee flight"
Help Papus reach his destination by ruling the bee and avoiding snakes on the way!

Complete all missions and restore order in Fixies Town! The game that all kids are in love with!
If you have any questions we are waiting for your letters: contact.devgame@gmail.com
Our website: http://devgamestudio.com/
